body:
* Added new version 3.0.0
* Fixed checksum for version 2.06.09
  + HepMC migrated its website [[1]](http://lcgapp.cern.ch/project/simu/HepMC) to [[2]](http://hepmc.web.cern.ch/hepmc/), so [1] is now deprecated.
  + Current checksum for 2.06.09 corresponds to the tarfile hosted in [1] but the url points to [2], therefore the fetch step fails.
* Added `url_for_version`: since versions older than 2.06.09 are only hosted by [1]
title: hepmc: fix checksum and urls, add new version 3.0.0
